action-group.diy-instructions:
IMPORTANT !
##################################################################### Login onto the Administration Control Panel (ACP)
A) Refresh the template and theme cache :
1) From the ACP Navigate to the "Styles" Tab. 2) Under "Style components " click on "Templates". 3) Under "Actions" click on "Refresh" for the SiteSplat style installed. 4) in the next screen, click on "Yes" to confirm 5) Repeat the steps for the "Themes" right under the "Templates" title
##################################################################### B) Purge the forum cache :
1) Navigate to General Tab 2) locate "Purge the cache" 3) Click on "Run Now" button to the right 4) in the next screen, click on "Yes" to confirm
C) Refresh your browser. 1)CTRL+F5 or F5 directly from your keyboard. #####################################################################
Enjoy it ! Don't forget to rate the theme 5 STARS on ThemeForest ;-) You can find the rating system under the "downloads" tab on your ThemeForest account.
http://themeforest.net/downloads/
Then Under the theme download button you will see the star rating system.
Cheers!
